name: Fallen Angel: Hardcore Apocalypse
description:
It's the end of the world. You're on the last standing land mass left on Earth. You, are the Fallen One. A Being from out of time. And you're here to F*ck Sh*t up. As you travel throughout the world, you'll meet powerful allies, and deadly foes. Including God, Satan, and the likes of Mickey Mouse.

-5+ Party Members to Choose from.

-Fusion System with 3 Different Character Combos

-A Super-Cursed storyline.

-Uncapped Stats that just keep goin.

-Multiple different sets of Weapons and Armor to choose from.

-A bumpin' soundtrack.

NOTE: CURRENTLY A WIP. THE ENTIRE GAME IS NEARLY FINISHED BUT THERE MAY BE BUGS. Be sure to leave them in the Comments below if you find any so I can fix them. Thank you.

Also, some exploits are completely by design to help you play how you want to.

-Lvcky.
